    • Class org.onehippo.forge.document.commenting.cms.api.CommentItem extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • id

          String id
          Comment data item identifier.

        • subjectId

          String subjectId
          The subject data identifier with this comment data item is associated. e.g, document handle UUID.

        • author

          String author
          Comment author user ID.

        • created

          Calendar created
          Creation date time of this comment data item.

        • lastModified

          Calendar lastModified
          Last modified date time of this comment data item.

        • content

          String content
          Comment content data.

        • attributes

          Map<K,V> attributes
          Extra attributes map of this comment data.
